Ankit Singh

Senior Software Test Automation Engineer @Epam Systems · (+91) 7044496717 · ankitsingh000@gmail.com

As a QA Automation Engineer, I apply my skills in test automation, frameworks, and Java to ensure the quality and performance of the company's financial software products and services. I work with the development and product teams to design, implement, and execute automated test cases, scripts, and scenarios, using tools such as Selenium, TestNG, and Postman.

I also contribute to enhancing and maintaining the test automation framework, incorporating best practices and industry standards. I also perform API, functional, and regression testing, using various methodologies and techniques. I have successfully delivered multiple projects with high quality and efficiency, meeting the expectations and requirements of the clients and stakeholders.

Building a comprehensive Regression Suite using Java and Selenium to meticulously validate intricate functionalities and enhance software reliability.

Creating agile Postman collections for Quick Smoke API Testing, swiftly verifying critical functionalities for robust backend performance.

Enhancing our automation framework with innovative features, augmenting its capabilities for deeper software insight and validation.

After this, the users could use their voice to know information like who their health care provider is and also understand their health care policy jargons easily with the help of Alexa.
